title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Design and Implementation of Reflective Practice-Based Qualitative Research Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can independently design all stages from qualitative research topic selection to data analysis through reflective practice
Learners can propose at least three strategies for handling ethical dilemmas during participant relationship-building and field observations
Learners can code interview/observation data collected in blended environments using tools like NVivo and visualize thematic connections
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
